TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataPagerFieldCollection extends System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection

summary.span: 表示 控件所使用的 对象的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects that are used by the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用类以编程方式管理的一组对象。You can use the class to programmatically manage a set of objects. 请注意，更常见的做法定义这些字段以声明方式而不是以编程方式。Note that it is more typical to define these fields declaratively instead of programmatically. 您可以访问的属性和方法类通过属性。You can access the properties and methods of the class through the property. 可以添加、 插入和移除通过使用适当的方法的对象类。You can add, insert, and remove objects by using the appropriate methods of the class. 若要以编程方式检索对象从一个集合，执行下列操作之一：To programmatically retrieve objects from a collection, do one of following: - 使用索引器获取单个集合中的对象。Use the indexer to get a single object from the collection. - 使用方法来创建一个对象，实现，您可以使用它来从集合中获取项。Use the method to create an object that implements , which you can then use to get items from the collection. 属性获取集合中的项总数。The property gets the total number of items in the collection. 它通常用于确定集合的上限。It is typically used to determine the upper bound of the collection. 可以将项添加和删除集合中的项，通过使用， ， ，和方法。You can add items and remove items in the collection by using the , , , and methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在内部调用方法在其实现集合方法。The method is called internally by the collection in its implementation of the method. 方法通过使用由指定标识的类型来创建对象的实例`index`，映射为返回的类型之一方法。The method creates an instance of an object by using the type identified by the specified `index`, which maps to one of the types returned by the method.
